title: b'UX Developer'
job description:
b"At Ping Identity, we're changing the way people think about enterprise security technology. With our innovative Identity Defined Security platform, we're helping to build a borderless world where people have total freedom to work wherever and however they want. Without friction. Without fear.

We call this digital freedom. And it's not just something we provide our customers. It's something that drives our company. People don't come here to join a culture that's built on digital freedom. They come to cultivate it.

We're headquartered in Denver, Colorado, and we have offices and employees around the globe. And we serve the largest, most demanding enterprises worldwide, including over half of the Fortune 100. Because even in the most complex enterprise environments, security shouldn't be a source of anxiety. It should be one of your greatest competitive advantages.

Ping Identity is looking for an experienced front-end developer to join our User Experience team. As a front-end developer you will use your strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript and your eye for detail to help our product teams implement our UX designs. The ideal candidate looks forward to tackling new challenges and is comfortable moving between different code bases and tech stacks while writing clean, maintainable code.

Responsibilities
Help maintain a variety of front-end experiences in both new and legacy projects.
Work with interface developers and back-end engineers to ensure design integrity across the Ping Identity product suite
Debug and troubleshoot issues across a variety of browsers
Translate mockups and wireframes into clean, maintainable code
Contribute to the Ping UX React component library


Requirements
5+ years experience in front-end development
Excellent HTML5, CSS and JavaScript skills
Experience with CSS frameworks and conventions (CSS3, SASS / LESS, BEM)
Experience with JavaScript frameworks (preferably React)
Working knowledge of Git and the command line
Great communication skills
A strong eye for design details"

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'SunIRef:it

Web Application Developer

Ascend Analytics, LLC

Boulder, CO 80302

We are looking for a Web Application Developer to join our programming team in Boulder, Colorado. As a Web Application Developer at Ascend Analytics, you will be responsible for development, documentation, and deployment packaging of exciting new cloud-based and hosted software applications.

If you want to help shape a new future of a cleaner and more cost-effective energy supply and work with an industry-leading software company with dedicated and talented people who are passionate about our future, this could be a great fit.

Ascend Analytics is an innovative "green tech" software and consulting company focused on energy analytics that are transforming the electric grid to renewables. Ascend's solutions provide the analytics to support critical power supply decisions from operating strategies over the next hour, to hedging and budgeting decisions over the next five years, to long-term investment and resource planning decisions over the next thirty years.

Job Description

As a valued member of our team, you will be responsible for software development, including UI/UX, business layer, documentation, test design and deployment scripting.

Job Responsibilities

Build user-friendly and intuitive web-based interfaces
Develop business layers, API interfaces and APIs
Contribute to application architecture development
Create documentation
Test design, test and debug code
Perform deployment scripting
Maintain applications

Required Skills & Knowledge

For success in this position you must have the following skills and experience:
3-5+ years of hands-on experience in a similar position
Skilled in UI/UX layout and design
Experience with DevOps best practices and version control
Knowledge of a modern JavaScript front-end framework, HTML, and CSS
Experience with OAUTH 2.0
Experience with Windows-based environments
API development experience

Preferred Skills & Knowledge

The following skills & qualities are considered a plus:

Knowledge of relational databases (SQL Server, Oracle)
Experience developing production-quality, client-facing applications
Azure, PowerBI experience
Experience with React UI Framework
Python, Bokeh experience
Unjaded and positive attitude
A BS or higher is required in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, or related field

Compensation

Negotiable based on qualifications and experience. Ascend highly values our employees and often pays above industry average.

We offer flexible work hours with a relaxed environment and opportunities for domestic and international travel. Excellent benefits are available, including medical, dental, vision, and a 401k plan. Ascend values their employees' overall well-being and we contribute a monthly stipend to any gym membership our employees choose. We are looking for talented individuals with a serious commitment to software development and power system optimization.

Please send your resume, transcripts and cover letter to: telling us why you are a good fit!

Ascend Analytics, LLC - Just posted
report job
original job
If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.'

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'POSITION DESCRIPTION: Write supporting code for web applications or web sites. Design, build, or maintain web sites, using authoring or scripting languages, content creation tools, management tools, and digital media. Back up files from web sites to local directories for instant recovery in case of problems. Select programming languages, design tools, or applications. Evaluate code to ensure that it is valid, is properly structured, meets industry standards, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems. Identify problems uncovered by testing or customer feedback, and correct problems or refer problems to appropriate personnel for correction. Develop databases that support web applications and websites. Perform web site tests according to planned schedules, or after any web site or product revision. Perform or direct web site updates. Maintain understanding of current web technologies or programming practices through continuing education, reading, or participation in professional conferences, workshops, or groups. Confer with management or development teams to prioritize needs, resolve conflicts, develop content criteria, or choose solutions. Document test plans, testing procedures, or test results. Develop or validate test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device types. Recommend and implement performance improvements. Create web models or prototypes that include physical interface, logical, or data models.

REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in Computer Science or Computer Information Systems. One year related experience as a Senior Developer. One year experience is required and must include: Refactoring LEGACY code including ROR (RUBY ON RAILS); optimizing code and search results to better target and serve business clients; remove extraneous code; building/testing APIS; implement technological aspects of business plan; and collaborating with colleagues and clients to identify needs, model and implement improvements using POSTGRESQL and ROR.

$42,182 \xe2\x80\x93 $60,000 per YEAR

Mail applications to 3120 Blake St. Denver CO 80205'

title: b'Full Stack Web Developer'
job description:
b"QSC thrives where innovative technology and compelling audio-visual experiences intersect. For over 50 years, QSC has pioneered the technology and solutions that enable immersive cinema, live performance audio, themed entertainment, digital collaboration and meeting experiences for our customers and partners around the world. A globally recognized innovator in the design, engineering, and manufacture of category leading high-performance loudspeakers, digital mixers, power amplifiers, audio processors, digital cinema solutions, and the Q-SYS\xe2\x84\xa2 software-based audio, video and control Ecosystem.

By joining the QSC team, you will be in a challenging, collaborative, fun, and innovative environment. We encourage employees to take ownership, to color outside the lines, and to imagine possibilities. Our culture is casual but dynamic, with cross-functional teams collaborating on creating memorable audio-visual experiences that deliver joy to people, wherever they are. At QSC, fun and hard work go hand in hand. Join us and make a difference in the way people experience movies, meetings, presentations, live performances, and much more.

The Full Stack Web Developer will employ front-end web technologies and Node.js in an embedded and cloud environment to bridge our Q-SYS platform to the connected world. Q-SYS is a fast growing, award winning, software and hardware platform encompassing cutting-edge audio, video and control products. You will creatively leverage web technologies to develop a leading web monitoring and management platform while respecting the unique requirements and challenges of a real-time distributed embedded system.

This position is based in Boulder, Colorado.

Responsibilities
Apply good software design and development practices in an agile scrum environment
Work with Software Quality Assurance to develop appropriate test strategies
Perform other duties as assigned
Qualifications
B.S. in Computer Science, or other STEM field with appropriate experience
Minimum 8 years' experience developing web applications
Minimum 3 years' experience with Node.js
Strong expertise in JavaScript/ES6
Expert knowledge of Node.js and the Node.js ecosystem
In-depth experience with front-end web technologies: HTML5, CSS, React/Redux, WebSockets
Demonstrated ability to deliver product features to customers in a production environment
Deep understanding of RESTful design principles and experience creating and consuming APIs
Solid understanding of web security fundamentals
Experience with revision control and CI tools
Experience with at least one cloud environment such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
Familiarity with databases and message brokers
Familiarity with container technologies and microservices architectures
Fluency with Linux command line tools
C++ development experience a bonus
Familiarity with professional audio and video products a bonus"

You are comfortable working in an existing codebase and have the judgment to make necessary changes to existing code while managing risk. \xe2\x80\xa2       Self learners, confident, will ask questions, love to learn

\xe2\x80\xa2       Strong verbal and written communication skills
\xe2\x80\xa2       Team focused mentality


Local candidates strongly preferred.

Qualified candidates, please email Jamie Olberding, Senior Technical Recruiter, at jolberding@adcc.com or apply through LinkedIn.'

title: b'Developer'
job description:
b'We have a unique opportunity for someone to contribute their talents and strengths as a Developer
 
A COMPANY TO BE PROUD OF
At Computershare we invite you to share our vision and commitment to excellence in everything that we do. Our 12,000 people around the globe are entrepreneurial and innovative, serving 16,000 clients and customers with precision and reliability because they count on us to deliver, every time. 
 
Computershare (ASX: CPU) is a global market leader in transfer agency and share registration, employee equity plans, mortgage servicing, proxy solicitation and stakeholder communications. We also specialize in corporate trust, bankruptcy, class action and utility administration, and a range of other diversified financial and governance services.
 
Founded in 1978, Computershare is renowned for its expertise in high integrity data management, high volume transaction processing and reconciliations, payments and stakeholder engagement. Many of the world\xe2\x80\x99s leading organizations use us to streamline and maximize the value of relationships with their investors, employees, creditors and customers.
Computershare is represented in all major financial markets and has over 12,000 employees worldwide.
 
DIVERSITY IS A STRENGTH
Across our global team, we see diversity as a source of strength. The more perspectives we have, the better equipped we\xe2\x80\x99ll be to meet the demands of our diverse global customer base. We want every person who joins out team, every customer and every supplier to feel welcome. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and believe in equality for everyone, regardless of age, national or ethnic origin, sex, gender identity or expression, race, color, religion, disability, sexual orientation, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected be applicable law. That applies throughout our company, around the world with no exceptions, regardless of differences. We will hire, develop, reward, promote and retain people purely on the basis of their talents, commitment, potential and the results they achieve. We will work hard to make sure everyone is included within our organization, removing barriers and obstacles to give everyone an equal opportunity to succeed.
 
OUR VALUES
Our key values \xe2\x80\x93 Certainty, Ingenuity and Advantage \xe2\x80\x93 drive everything we do: you can count on us to deliver with precision and reliability, every time. We look beyond today\xe2\x80\x99s problems to find tomorrow\xe2\x80\x99s solutions, focusing on finding new and better way to unlock your competitive edge and help you achieve your business goals.
 
A ROLE YOU WILL LOVE
Under general supervision, develops, codes, test, and debugs new software or enhancements to existing software customers. Requires good understanding of business application. Works with technical staff to understand problems with software and resolve them. Resolves customer complaints with software and responds to suggestions for improvements and enhancements from customers. May assist in development of software user manuals. Demonstrates software.
 
Primary Accountabilities
Responsible for programming, maintenance, technical support, documentation and administration of core applications, databases, and utilities.  Support the complete software development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, specifications, development, change management, testing and deployment activities in accordance with Best Practices and Code Standards. 
Work collaboratively with team members and business partners in defining, designing, developing and implementing technology solutions to improve business functions.  Provides analysis and design support in identifying, evaluating, and developing systems and procedures which are cost effective and meet user requirements.  Analyze applications and implement improvements to optimize performance.
Participate in the planning and implementation of projects, which includes the design and execution of acceptance test plans to ensure a successful implementation.  Perform thorough testing your own and other team members\xe2\x80\x99 developed code.   Develop system documentation for all developed applications, including design and technical specifications.
Display understanding of IT computing environment and daily operations and understands the impact of planned changes.  Provide tiered production support including limited on-call and participate in design and technical meetings.
Track and report development progress and performance on a regular basis.
Other duties or tasks as assigned by management.
WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU
Required:
The ability to function as a team player and lead team members in small projects
Ability to work in a collaborative, dynamic team environment and interact at all levels to ensure reliability, availability, scalability, and performance of applications
Ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Excellent organizational, time management and project planning/strategizing skills
Strong analytical and problem resolution skills
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Must possess strong attention to detail, excellent relationship management skills, and the ability to effectively facilitate and lead design and implementation of software systems with development teams
Proficient in identifying project needs, estimating and prioritizing tasks, setting intermediate goals and milestones to accomplish the final outcome
KEY QUALIFICATIONS
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
 
Education and Experience
Required:
3-5 years of professional, technical experience in a developer role
Demonstrated experience with adhering to usability, design and development standards
Demonstrated experience with all aspects of unit testing, performance testing and user acceptance testing
Proficiency or knowledge in the following:
HTML/CSS/Javascript.
Microsoft Windows environment development.
C#, ASP.Net MVC framework and/or .Net Core, JQuery. 
Cross-browser development and design.
OWASP top 10 and general secure development principles. 
Unit testing principles. Version control principles.
Preferred:
Experience with developing web services in an enterprise production environment
Experience with varied source and version control systems, caching frameworks
In-depth experience with various SDLCs, Waterfall and Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Hybrid)
Proficiency or knowledge in the following:
Adaptive/Responsive web design.
Frontend frameworks such as AngularJS & Bootstrap. 
CSS Preprocessors.
Microsoft Azure or general cloud development.
RESTful APIs.
T-SQL.
Scalable and secure web architecture.
MS accreditation would be beneficial.
Preferred:  Microsoft Certified Professional Developer (MCPD)
Travel Required
It is expected that this position may include travel up to 10% of the time.  This is subject to change based on many factors, including business needs.
 
Language Ability
Ability to read/analyze/interpret business periodicals/ journals/technical procedures/gov. regulations; write reports/business correspondence/procedure manuals; effectively present information/resp
ond to questions from managers/clients/customers/public.
 
Mathematical Ability
Ability to work with mathematical concepts such as probability and statistical inference, fundamentals of plane, and solid geometry and trigonometry.  Ability to apply concepts such as fractions, percentages, ratios, and proportions to practical situations
 
Work Environment
The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
The noise level in the environment is moderate
Physical Demands
The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
Sedentary work: Exerting up to 10 pounds of force occasionally and/or a negligible amount of force frequently or constantly to lift, carry, push, pull or otherwise move objects. Sedentary work involves sitting most of the time. Jobs are sedentary if walking and standing are required only occasionally and all other sedentary criteria are met.
REWARDS AS UNIQUE AS YOU
A choice medical insurance plans designed to meet your needs
Dental & Vision insurance
Life & Disability insurance
Flexible spending and health savings accounts
Employee Stock Purchase Plan
Paid time off - You\xe2\x80\x99ll accrue 3 weeks your first year!
Nine Holidays
$1,000 Employee Referral Program
Wellness programs
Matching 401(k)
Tuition Reimbursement
Banking and investments plans
Rewards and recognition programs
Employee discounts for wellness, auto & homeowners insurance, wireless service and more\xe2\x80\xa6
To learn more, visit us at www.computershare.com/mycareer.
 
Your career is waiting.
 
Computershare is an Equal Opportunity Employer.  Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national or ethnic origin, age, disability, protected veteran status, or other characteristics protected by applicable law.
 
#CPUIT
*CB'

title: b'Junior Web Developer'
job description:

About Us

Kroenke Sports & Entertainment (KSE) is an American Sports and entertainment holding company based in Denver, Colorado. Kroenke Sports & Entertainment is committed to providing world class sports and entertainment for both live and broadcast audiences. We will welcome fans into our venues as family, providing respect and care from the purchase of a ticket, to the drive home. title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'POSITION SUMMARY:

Velocity Global is one of the fastest growing self-funded companies in the country and hands down one of the greatest places to work anywhere in the world. But it\xe2\x80\x99s not for everyone. There are certain qualities and passions you must have to fit into our \xe2\x80\x9cTeam of 10\xe2\x80\x99s\xe2\x80\x9d:
We move with VELOCITY and you have to relish in a fast-paced, high-growth environment
We believe in being of service, which means you have to check your ego at the door
We believe in taking our work seriously but not being serious at work
We find passion in all things international business \xe2\x80\x93 it has to be in your bones

If you find the above personal attributes apply to you, continue reading.

We are looking for a creative and talented Web Developer to be based in our Denver, CO headquarters. This full-time position will be responsible for a wide variety of web development and design duties to enhance our corporate website and assist in marketing efforts. The successful candidate is proficient at coding/customizing open source CMS systems and turning unique designs into dynamic websites, microsites and online campaigns. This role requires a high level of creativity, attention to detail, and project management skills. This individual will report to the Creative Services Manager and will work closely with the marketing team and all sides of the organization.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
Create custom-coded, engaging, web solutions using HTML5, CSS3/SASS, Javascript, and WordPress/PHP.
Develop, design, and continuously improve the corporate website, landing pages, microsites, etc. to support the overall marketing strategy and revenue goals
Work closely with creative team to transform visual concepts into interactive, multi-media experiences
Create custom-code solutions for Marketing Automation Platforms and CRMs (HubSpot/Marketo/Salesforce) including landing pages, emails, campaigns.
Create interactive diagrams, dynamic maps, and animations using HTML5.
Develop code using best practices for mobile and responsive design.
Set up and maintain Google Webmaster Tools, Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics, etc.
Implement best practices for marketing analytics, SEO, and GDPR compliance.
Make frequent enhancements and optimizations to web properties for optimal speed and security.
Document web development improvements and processes
Manage the host server, database, and ongoing maintenance.
Understand our different audiences and buyer personas to help guide targeted web content that addresses their unique needs and concerns.
Ensure that all projects are delivered in a timely manner.
Support brand consistency across all digital channels.
Work closely with Digital Experience team to continually A/B test elements within our digital properties to optimize the user experience and drive conversions
The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not construed to be an exhaustive list of all job duties performed by the personnel so classified.

QUALIFICATIONS:
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.

Education/Experience:
3-5 years of experience in enterprise website development using WordPress.
Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree or experience equivalent
Proficient in HTML5, CSS3/SASS, Javascript, and WordPress/PHP.
Adept at mobile and responsive design, testing, and troubleshooting.
Seasoned with WordPress creation of custom post types, Bootstrap framework, standard plugin understanding (Visual Composer, Gravity Forms, Advanced Custom Fields, Yoast)
Server management: Domain control panels, DNS, website testing and launch
Proficient with Adobe Creative Suite, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Microsoft Office and other analytics tools
Experience optimizing digital channels for SEO, mobile, cross-platform and cross-browser issues
Must have exceptional attention to detail and project management skills
Ability to own a project from start to finish, working autonomously, but welcoming feedback and collaboration
Passionate about branding, storytelling, and producing engaging content and campaigns.
Strong communicator with the ability to prioritize and manage work effectively while adhering to critical timelines
UI design experience a plus
WordPress and HubSpot/Marketo experience required

Velocity Global is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, age, disability, genetic information, or any other status protected by State and/or Federal Law.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Web Developer \xe2\x80\x93 Boulder, CO

Matter Communications is an independent and thriving integrated marketing firm focused on what matters most: our people, our clients and our results. From fast growth startups to established brands, we work with B2B and B2C companies at all stages of development and across all industries.

We\xe2\x80\x99ve built and nurtured a team-oriented, supportive environment because we know that when we tap into our collective brainpower we come up with inspired solutions for our clients and because it makes for a happy place to work.  While we\xe2\x80\x99re serious about what we do, we try not to take ourselves too seriously. 

Matter is looking for an experienced Front-End Developer to join and grow our web development team. This position will lead and build digital web solutions for clients.  This person will play a key role as part of the digital marketing team and will help ensure our clients can deliver best in class digital experiences.  The ideal candidate is willing to roll up their sleeves in our fast-paced environment, will be an expert on all things development, and is able to thrive in client facing interactions.  

Responsibilities:

Day-to-day responsibilities include the development of web-based applications and websites
Integration of code with other technologies (web services, client backend systems, content management systems, etc.)
Optimizing performance of frontend applications
Collaborate with clients and internal teams to assist with briefs, gathering requirements and functional specifications
Engage in brainstorming and collaborate with other developers on the team to solve problems and craft innovative, bespoke web solutions for our clients
Be an internal expert on all things web development, mentor and share knowledge with staff
Continually explore and evaluate new technologies, frameworks, and methodologies that Matter can leverage to improve both our own internal web development processes and the overall service we provide to our clients
Collaborating with clients, digital marketing team, and creative group to develop web solutions for our clients
Assist with updating and maintaining our portfolio of client sites, as well as Matter\xe2\x80\x99s own website
Develop, coordinate, and evolve quality assurance (testing) procedures to ensure error-free work product
Technical Requirements:

Portfolio of web work in the B2B and B2C space
At least 2-4 years\xe2\x80\x99 experience in a digital agency or web development environment
At least 3-5 years of WordPress & PHP development experience
Wordpress Custom Theme Development & ACF Experience
JavaScript & jQuery experience
MySQL experience
HubSpot COS experience
Experience creating responsive, mobile friendly websites
Experience working with graphic designers and converting designs to code
Experience implementing analytics code and setting up analytic event tracking using various platforms (Google Analytics, HubSpot, Google Tag Manager, Marketo, etc.)
Ecommerce development experience
MarTech integration experience
Non-Technical Requirements:

College graduate with B.A./B.S. degree
Autonomous and driven to own deliverables from beginning to end with little direct supervision
Demonstrated ability to project manage, set priorities, and solve problems
Demonstrated experience supervising, mentoring, and leading other developers
Ability to collaborate as part of integrated teams of non-technical colleagues.
Ability to collaborate and participate in new business development efforts
Matter provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws'

title: b'Javascript Developer'
job description:
b'Company
Anark is a leading provider of intelligent information management (IIM) software and solutions for technical industry, enabling engineering, procurement, manufacturing, and field service organizations to publish and manage technical content, for access and collaboration workflows across the extended enterprise\xe2\x80\x94yielding faster iterations, reduced material waste, and higher-quality products and services with substantial cost savings.
Anark helps market leaders such as GE, Boeing, Lockheed Martin, Allison Transmission, Johnson & Johnson, Cisco, Ericsson, and TE Connectivity with their Digital Transformation, leveraging smart technical content to streamline procurement, manufacturing, and field service operations.

Culture
Come work in a cutting-edge, exciting, fun, energetic, friendly, and supportive work environment. Anark Corporation strives to be a \xe2\x80\x9cchange the world\xe2\x80\x9d innovator.

Opportunity
As a JavaScript Developer at Anark (Solutions Engineer II internally) you will be in a 3 part hybrid role; JavaScript Software Developer, a customer-facing Solutions Engineer, and also work as a Software QA (UI Test) engineer across the whole enterprise system. This is a very exciting and multi-faceted role. In addition to providing direct customer support including customer solution deliverables, this position is also responsible for the development of internal QA test strategies, data test cases, and tools necessary to guarantee the quality of Anark software.

The ideal candidate will be proficient in JavaScript and have completed a 4 year degree from an accredited University with a Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, or Electrical Engineering degree. 

Required Knowledge and Skills
Experience with web application development using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Bootstrap.
IT experience configuring software systems, including databases.
Experience with the principles of manufacturing engineering or technical industries.
Strong technical and communication skills\xe2\x80\x94capable of garnering the respect of team members and associates within the company.
Strong work ethic\xe2\x80\x94able to manage multiple customer deliverables while adhering to customer-negotiated schedules.

Desired Skills
JavaScript web-based automated test framework.
Experience with Windows and Linux server systems.
AWS, Azure, or Oracle Cloud computing services experience.
MCAD or ECAD experience.

Required Education and Professional Experience
BS in Computer Science, Aerospace Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent preferred
BSCS new graduates accepted
Bootcamp + 1 year of corporate developer experience considered

Compensation
Anark offers a competitive salary, performance bonus plan, stock options, 401(k) retirement program with employer match, and a comprehensive and generous benefits program.

Citizenship
This position requires either US citizenship or US permanent resident legal status. A background check will be performed on all qualified applicants prior to an offer for employment.'

title: b'Web Designer'
job description:
b"Position Summary
Location: Denver, Colorado
Experience: 2+ years
Commitment: Full-time
Compensation: Competitive based on experience and skill set.
Position: This is an employed position. Must be located and authorized to work in the United States.
Skill level: Intermediate
Revive Design Studios is looking for a talented Web Designer to design and develop thoughtful, attractive, easy-to-use online experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design.

This is an important role at Revive. The right fit will take ownership of our web design projects by designing new features and websites. They will establish and promote good design guidelines from conception through launch. The Web Designer needs to be comfortable communicating design decisions and rationale to our clients and internally.

This position also will support our fullstack development by coding up the responsive front-end of projects and tracking changes using Git. They will also help with integrating HTML/CSS/JS provided by our marketing partner and troubleshoot and fix common website HTML/CSS/image issues. We primarily work within the Shopify ecommerce (CMS) platform.

Above all else, we are a team, so assistance in solving problems will be provided to ensure you're successful in your role. This position reports to the CEO who will be providing weekly check-ins to support you as you grow in your career with us.

What We Are Looking For (Must haves)
2+ years of experience designing and launching consumer-facing web projects.
Adobe Creative Suite experience: Illustrator, Photoshop, XD
Front-end development experience: HTML/CSS and basic JS
Demonstrable web design skills with a strong portfolio
Proficiency using CSS frameworks and with CSS preprocessors
Experience creating wireframes, user flows, and graphic content
Design experiences that are incredibly simple and elegant for both mobile & web
An understanding of front-end web development best practices to create responsive, fast-loading websites

To Be Successful

Experience with the following is helpful, but not required for the initial hire. To be successful, you'll need to learn:
Interactive prototyping with Adobe XD
Shopify CMS and Ecommerce platform
Ecommerce design pattern standards
Photo best practices for the web
Basic Liquid Templating Language skills
Basic Git skills

Traits We're Seeking
Entrepreneurial and team-oriented spirit to help scale our small and growing team.
Constructively communicates ideas and rationale with a broad set of stakeholders to ensure quality
Appreciates delivering products incrementally to provide value to clients as early as possible.
Ability to brainstorm around project hurdles and come up with creative, human-centered solutions.
Enjoys learning from and collaborating with co-workers.
Professionally communicates with clients and coworkers via phone calls, Google Hangouts and Slack.
Interest in the outdoors, sports, and non-profit sectors is a plus.
Comfortable managing multiple projects at once

Benefits
Engaging coworking office space
Education stipend toward web design and development
Paid Vacation and Sick Leave
Paid Maternity/Paternity Leave
Additional time off on major U.S. holidays
401(k) with match
Fun, collegial atmosphere"

title: b'Ruby on Rails Developer #: 20-04473'
job description:

title: b'UX Developer'
job description:
b"At Ping Identity, we're changing the way people think about enterprise security technology. With our innovative Identity Defined Security platform, we're helping to build a borderless world where people have total freedom to work wherever and however they want. Without friction. Without fear.

We call this digital freedom. And it's not just something we provide our customers. It's something that drives our company. People don't come here to join a culture that's built on digital freedom. They come to cultivate it.

We're headquartered in Denver, Colorado, and we have offices and employees around the globe. And we serve the largest, most demanding enterprises worldwide, including over half of the Fortune 100. Because even in the most complex enterprise environments, security shouldn't be a source of anxiety. It should be one of your greatest competitive advantages.

Ping Identity is looking for an experienced front-end developer to join our User Experience team. As a front-end developer you will use your strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript and your eye for detail to help our product teams implement our UX designs. The ideal candidate looks forward to tackling new challenges and is comfortable moving between different code bases and tech stacks while writing clean, maintainable code.

Responsibilities
Help maintain a variety of front-end experiences in both new and legacy projects.
Work with interface developers and back-end engineers to ensure design integrity across the Ping Identity product suite
Debug and troubleshoot issues across a variety of browsers
Translate mockups and wireframes into clean, maintainable code
Contribute to the Ping UX React component library


Requirements
5+ years experience in front-end development
Excellent HTML5, CSS and JavaScript skills
Experience with CSS frameworks and conventions (CSS3, SASS / LESS, BEM)
Experience with JavaScript frameworks (preferably React)
Working knowledge of Git and the command line
Great communication skills
A strong eye for design details"

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'SunIRef:it

Web Application Developer

Ascend Analytics, LLC

Boulder, CO 80302

We are looking for a Web Application Developer to join our programming team in Boulder, Colorado. As a Web Application Developer at Ascend Analytics, you will be responsible for development, documentation, and deployment packaging of exciting new cloud-based and hosted software applications.

If you want to help shape a new future of a cleaner and more cost-effective energy supply and work with an industry-leading software company with dedicated and talented people who are passionate about our future, this could be a great fit.

Ascend Analytics is an innovative "green tech" software and consulting company focused on energy analytics that are transforming the electric grid to renewables. Ascend's solutions provide the analytics to support critical power supply decisions from operating strategies over the next hour, to hedging and budgeting decisions over the next five years, to long-term investment and resource planning decisions over the next thirty years.

Job Description

As a valued member of our team, you will be responsible for software development, including UI/UX, business layer, documentation, test design and deployment scripting.

Job Responsibilities

Build user-friendly and intuitive web-based interfaces
Develop business layers, API interfaces and APIs
Contribute to application architecture development
Create documentation
Test design, test and debug code
Perform deployment scripting
Maintain applications

Required Skills & Knowledge

For success in this position you must have the following skills and experience:
3-5+ years of hands-on experience in a similar position
Skilled in UI/UX layout and design
Experience with DevOps best practices and version control
Knowledge of a modern JavaScript front-end framework, HTML, and CSS
Experience with OAUTH 2.0
Experience with Windows-based environments
API development experience

Preferred Skills & Knowledge

The following skills & qualities are considered a plus:

Knowledge of relational databases (SQL Server, Oracle)
Experience developing production-quality, client-facing applications
Azure, PowerBI experience
Experience with React UI Framework
Python, Bokeh experience
Unjaded and positive attitude
A BS or higher is required in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, or related field

Compensation

Negotiable based on qualifications and experience. Ascend highly values our employees and often pays above industry average.

We offer flexible work hours with a relaxed environment and opportunities for domestic and international travel. Excellent benefits are available, including medical, dental, vision, and a 401k plan. Ascend values their employees' overall well-being and we contribute a monthly stipend to any gym membership our employees choose. We are looking for talented individuals with a serious commitment to software development and power system optimization.

Please send your resume, transcripts and cover letter to: telling us why you are a good fit!

Ascend Analytics, LLC - Just posted
report job
original job
If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.'

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'POSITION DESCRIPTION: Write supporting code for web applications or web sites. Design, build, or maintain web sites, using authoring or scripting languages, content creation tools, management tools, and digital media. Back up files from web sites to local directories for instant recovery in case of problems. Select programming languages, design tools, or applications. Evaluate code to ensure that it is valid, is properly structured, meets industry standards, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems. Identify problems uncovered by testing or customer feedback, and correct problems or refer problems to appropriate personnel for correction. Develop databases that support web applications and websites. Perform web site tests according to planned schedules, or after any web site or product revision. Perform or direct web site updates. Maintain understanding of current web technologies or programming practices through continuing education, reading, or participation in professional conferences, workshops, or groups. Confer with management or development teams to prioritize needs, resolve conflicts, develop content criteria, or choose solutions. Document test plans, testing procedures, or test results. Develop or validate test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device types. Recommend and implement performance improvements. Create web models or prototypes that include physical interface, logical, or data models.

REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in Computer Science or Computer Information Systems. One year related experience as a Senior Developer. One year experience is required and must include: Refactoring LEGACY code including ROR (RUBY ON RAILS); optimizing code and search results to better target and serve business clients; remove extraneous code; building/testing APIS; implement technological aspects of business plan; and collaborating with colleagues and clients to identify needs, model and implement improvements using POSTGRESQL and ROR.

$42,182 \xe2\x80\x93 $60,000 per YEAR

Mail applications to 3120 Blake St. Denver CO 80205'

title: b'Full Stack Web Developer'
job description:
b"QSC thrives where innovative technology and compelling audio-visual experiences intersect. For over 50 years, QSC has pioneered the technology and solutions that enable immersive cinema, live performance audio, themed entertainment, digital collaboration and meeting experiences for our customers and partners around the world. A globally recognized innovator in the design, engineering, and manufacture of category leading high-performance loudspeakers, digital mixers, power amplifiers, audio processors, digital cinema solutions, and the Q-SYS\xe2\x84\xa2 software-based audio, video and control Ecosystem.

By joining the QSC team, you will be in a challenging, collaborative, fun, and innovative environment. We encourage employees to take ownership, to color outside the lines, and to imagine possibilities. Our culture is casual but dynamic, with cross-functional teams collaborating on creating memorable audio-visual experiences that deliver joy to people, wherever they are. At QSC, fun and hard work go hand in hand. Join us and make a difference in the way people experience movies, meetings, presentations, live performances, and much more.

The Full Stack Web Developer will employ front-end web technologies and Node.js in an embedded and cloud environment to bridge our Q-SYS platform to the connected world. Q-SYS is a fast growing, award winning, software and hardware platform encompassing cutting-edge audio, video and control products. You will creatively leverage web technologies to develop a leading web monitoring and management platform while respecting the unique requirements and challenges of a real-time distributed embedded system.

This position is based in Boulder, Colorado.

Responsibilities
Apply good software design and development practices in an agile scrum environment
Work with Software Quality Assurance to develop appropriate test strategies
Perform other duties as assigned
Qualifications
B.S. in Computer Science, or other STEM field with appropriate experience
Minimum 8 years' experience developing web applications
Minimum 3 years' experience with Node.js
Strong expertise in JavaScript/ES6
Expert knowledge of Node.js and the Node.js ecosystem
In-depth experience with front-end web technologies: HTML5, CSS, React/Redux, WebSockets
Demonstrated ability to deliver product features to customers in a production environment
Deep understanding of RESTful design principles and experience creating and consuming APIs
Solid understanding of web security fundamentals
Experience with revision control and CI tools
Experience with at least one cloud environment such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
Familiarity with databases and message brokers
Familiarity with container technologies and microservices architectures
Fluency with Linux command line tools
C++ development experience a bonus
Familiarity with professional audio and video products a bonus"

title: b'Full Stack Web Software Developer'
job description:
b"ServerLogic has partnered with a growing company with offices in Denver, to identify a Full Stack Web Software Developer for this direct hire opportunity.
  In this role, you will own some of the company\xe2\x80\x99s web applications to deliver and manage existing and new Internet products. The ideal candidate has a passion for building maintainable and scalable applications, solving problems, and delighting customers and business stakeholders.

You are able to break down complex problems and you design elegant, easy-to-maintain solutions that are resilient and robust. You are comfortable working in an existing codebase and have the judgment to make necessary changes to existing code while managing risk. You also have the ability to gather requirements from business managers, gain insight into business processes, and communicate ideas clearly to team members in order to support multi-person projects.

Responsibilities:
Develop scalable and maintainable web applications. Products may include user interfaces, integrations with third party web services and new or existing databases.
Develop functional prototypes and beta web applications quickly to support market trials.
Support existing web applications including troubleshooting, bug fixing, required upgrades and modifications to existing functionality.
Work with business stakeholders to define/clarify project requirements and acceptance criteria, define success metrics for features to be delivered

Required Skills/Experience:
Bachelor's or advanced degree in computer science, engineering, or mathematics.
3+ years developing web applications with C#, ASP.NET MVC, JavaScript, Node, and JS frameworks (Angular/react/Vue)
Experience developing business applications using SQL Server or other RDBMS and NoSQL databases.
Knowledge of current best practices of web application development using HTML 5 and CSS.
Strong understanding of software engineering best practices such as SOLID principles and design patterns.
Development experience under an agile development methodology and process
Strong written and oral communication, documentation and interpersonal skills.
Experience building and consuming microservices such as Rest or GraphQL
Experience with unit testing and test-driven development.
Experience using tools Jira, Visual Studio, Git, VS Code, VSTS
Strong collaboration skills and a desire to help and learn from other developers
Ability to grasp complex business logic and project requirements
A willingness to question things and voice your opinion
Azure Platform (Provisioning, monitoring performance, Application Insights, etc)

Bonus Skills/Experience:
Development experience of mobile-first user interfaces

All job offers are contingent upon passing a background check."

title: b'Salesforce Developer'
job description:
b'The Senior Salesforce Developer collaborates with business partners to develop and integrate in a complex enterprise Salesforce environment, continually improving the end-user experience. This includes proprietary enterprise applications designed and developed in-house as well as third-party applications hosted externally. Company is delivering business value through DevOps/Agile teams where they are implementing Continuous Integration/ Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) practices with automated testing. Company is accelerating their digital and customer experiences through on-line banking/cash management, customer portal, and mobile application development.

Requirements:
Minimum 5 years of Salesforce development and integration experience with Visualforce, Apex (classes/controllers/triggers), SOQL, App Exchanges, and Force.com. E-commerce solutions, platform apps, custom apps, design app data models, logic, interfaces, and security

Four years of developing and integrating software within the full Microsoft technology stack, including desktop and server systems preferred.
Customer service, excellent verbal and written communication skills, and able to excel collaborating in an Agile team environment.'

title: b'Senior Front End Developer'
job description:
b"Job Title: Roku Developer
Denver, CO
Contract to the end of 2020 (high likelihood of extension)

Summary: The team is looking to bring on additional Roku Developer to support recent asks from the Business-to-Business organization within this Fortune 100 Client. This Consultant will begin by working alongside the existing development team to learn workflows and some of the intricacies of the client\xe2\x80\x99s environment. After about a month of ramp-up, this individual will begin to take on new development responsibilities, primarily dedicated to the expansion of the organization\xe2\x80\x99s small-business footprint through the creation of custom, specialized features on the Roku platform.
                                                                  Day-to-day responsibilities: This individual will be working with the senior development manager (Mark Kocourek) and other stakeholders to understand requirements and design/ develop content for the Roku platform. Main responsibilities will include: contribute to the design, architecture, and deployment of Charter\xe2\x80\x99s Roku platform. They will take part in all aspects of the software creation process (software architecture and design, application UI design and prototyping, OO development, unit testing/test-driven development, integration testing, deployment, maintenance, post-deployment production support). Although some testing responsibilities are listed, the majority of those will be handled by the DevTest resource that is being brought on to support the same effort.

What\xe2\x80\x99s in it for you?

About Eight Eleven:
At Eight Eleven, our business is people. Relationships are at the center of what we do. A successful partnership is only as strong as the relationship built. We\xe2\x80\x99re your trusted partner for IT hiring, recruiting and staffing needs.

With our national team of recruiters placed at 21 major hubs around the nation, Eight Eleven finds the people best-suited for your business. When you work with us, we work with you. That\xe2\x80\x99s the Eight Eleven promise.
Eight Eleven Group provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, citizenship, disability, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, amnesty or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state, and local laws."

title: b'Software Engineer, Backend'
job description:
b"Software Engineer, Backend

Slack is looking for Backend Engineers to build features, design and implement API methods, and improve the performance and reliability of our systems as we rapidly scale our product and organization.

We build our app using reliable tools that our team knows and trusts, including PHP/Hack, Java, MySQL, and Linux. Expertise in these areas is a huge plus, but having familiarity with other common web languages (such as Python or Ruby) and other relational databases are fine substitutes. We\xe2\x80\x99re a collaborative team who genuinely enjoys working together with a cross-functional team of product managers, designers, frontend, iOS, Android, automation, and quality engineers to make Slack a better product. We are looking for engineers that understand that simplicity and reliability are aspects of a system to be carefully calculated with every decision made.

A Taste Of Our Scale And Reach
Users spend over 10 hours connected and 2+ hours active in Slack every work day.
10M+ Daily Active Users in more than 150 countries.
1.5 billion messages are sent per month, half of those outside the United States.
Every day we see over 3.5 million simultaneously connected users, over 3.5 billion web requests, over 42 billion database queries per day, and our systems see over 1 million queries/second in our caching tier.
We have 8.8M+ app installations with 155,000 weekly active developers building on the developer platform.
90% of our paid teams on Slack actively use apps.

Slack has a positive, diverse, and supportive culture\xe2\x80\x94we look for people who are curious, inventive, and work to be a little better every single day. In our work together we aim to be smart, humble, hardworking and, above all, collaborative. If this sounds like a good fit for you, why not say hello?

What You Will Be Doing
You'll brainstorm with Product Managers, Designers, Backend, and Frontend Engineers on your team to conceptualize and build new features for our large (and growing!) user base.
You\xe2\x80\x99ll produce high-quality results by contributing heavily to team projects that have a significant impact on the business.
You\xe2\x80\x99ll actively own team features or systems and define their long-term health, while also improving the health of surrounding systems.
You'll assist our skilled support team and operations team in triaging and resolving production issues.
You'll mentor other engineers and deeply review code.
You\xe2\x80\x99ll improve engineering standards, tooling, and processes


What You Should Have
You\xe2\x80\x99ve been building web applications professionally for 2+ years.
You have experience with functional or imperative programming languages -- e.g., PHP, Python, Ruby, Go, C, or Java.
You can contribute to technical architecture discussions and help drive technical decisions within your team.
You write understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability.
You are a strong communicator. Explaining complex technical concepts to designers, support, and other engineers is no problem for you.
You possess strong computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, programming languages, distributed systems, and information retrieval.
You have completed a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.

Slack is a layer of the business technology stack that brings together people, data, and applications \xe2\x80\x93 a single place where people can effectively work together, find important information, and access hundreds of thousands of critical applications and services to do their best work. From global Fortune 100 companies to corner markets, businesses and teams of all kinds use Slack to bring the right people together with all the right information. Slack is headquartered in San Francisco, CA and has offices around the world. For more information on how Slack makes teams better connected, visit slack.com.

Ensuring a diverse and inclusive workplace where we learn from each other is core to Slack\xe2\x80\x99s values. We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives. We are an equal opportunity employer and a pleasant and supportive place to work.

Come do the best work of your life here at Slack."

title: b'Developer'
job description:
b'We have a unique opportunity for someone to contribute their talents and strengths as a Developer
 
A COMPANY TO BE PROUD OF
At Computershare we invite you to share our vision and commitment to excellence in everything that we do. Our 12,000 people around the globe are entrepreneurial and innovative, serving 16,000 clients and customers with precision and reliability because they count on us to deliver, every time. 
 
Computershare (ASX: CPU) is a global market leader in transfer agency and share registration, employee equity plans, mortgage servicing, proxy solicitation and stakeholder communications. We also specialize in corporate trust, bankruptcy, class action and utility administration, and a range of other diversified financial and governance services.
 
Founded in 1978, Computershare is renowned for its expertise in high integrity data management, high volume transaction processing and reconciliations, payments and stakeholder engagement. Many of the world\xe2\x80\x99s leading organizations use us to streamline and maximize the value of relationships with their investors, employees, creditors and customers.
Computershare is represented in all major financial markets and has over 12,000 employees worldwide.
 
DIVERSITY IS A STRENGTH
Across our global team, we see diversity as a source of strength. The more perspectives we have, the better equipped we\xe2\x80\x99ll be to meet the demands of our diverse global customer base. We want every person who joins out team, every customer and every supplier to feel welcome. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and believe in equality for everyone, regardless of age, national or ethnic origin, sex, gender identity or expression, race, color, religion, disability, sexual orientation, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected be applicable law. That applies throughout our company, around the world with no exceptions, regardless of differences. We will hire, develop, reward, promote and retain people purely on the basis of their talents, commitment, potential and the results they achieve. We will work hard to make sure everyone is included within our organization, removing barriers and obstacles to give everyone an equal opportunity to succeed.
 
OUR VALUES
Our key values \xe2\x80\x93 Certainty, Ingenuity and Advantage \xe2\x80\x93 drive everything we do: you can count on us to deliver with precision and reliability, every time. We look beyond today\xe2\x80\x99s problems to find tomorrow\xe2\x80\x99s solutions, focusing on finding new and better way to unlock your competitive edge and help you achieve your business goals.
 
A ROLE YOU WILL LOVE
Under general supervision, develops, codes, test, and debugs new software or enhancements to existing software customers. Requires good understanding of business application. Works with technical staff to understand problems with software and resolve them. Resolves customer complaints with software and responds to suggestions for improvements and enhancements from customers. May assist in development of software user manuals. Demonstrates software.
 
Primary Accountabilities
Responsible for programming, maintenance, technical support, documentation and administration of core applications, databases, and utilities.  Support the complete software development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, specifications, development, change management, testing and deployment activities in accordance with Best Practices and Code Standards. 
Work collaboratively with team members and business partners in defining, designing, developing and implementing technology solutions to improve business functions.  Provides analysis and design support in identifying, evaluating, and developing systems and procedures which are cost effective and meet user requirements.  Analyze applications and implement improvements to optimize performance.
Participate in the planning and implementation of projects, which includes the design and execution of acceptance test plans to ensure a successful implementation.  Perform thorough testing your own and other team members\xe2\x80\x99 developed code.   Develop system documentation for all developed applications, including design and technical specifications.
Display understanding of IT computing environment and daily operations and understands the impact of planned changes.  Provide tiered production support including limited on-call and participate in design and technical meetings.
Track and report development progress and performance on a regular basis.
Other duties or tasks as assigned by management.
WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU
Required:
The ability to function as a team player and lead team members in small projects
Ability to work in a collaborative, dynamic team environment and interact at all levels to ensure reliability, availability, scalability, and performance of applications
Ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Excellent organizational, time management and project planning/strategizing skills
Strong analytical and problem resolution skills
Strong verbal and written communication skills

Proficient in identifying project needs, estimating and prioritizing tasks, setting intermediate goals and milestones to accomplish the final outcome
KEY QUALIFICATIONS
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Microsoft Windows environment development.
C#, ASP.Net MVC framework and/or .Net Core, JQuery. 
Cross-browser development and design.

Preferred:
Experience with developing web services in an enterprise production environment
Experience with varied source and version control systems, caching frameworks
In-depth experience with various SDLCs, Waterfall and Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Hybrid)
Proficiency or knowledge in the following:

Language Ability

ond to questions from managers/clients/customers/public.

title: b'Junior Web Developer'
job description:
b'JUNIOR WEB DEVELOPER, OUTDOOR SPORTSMAN GROUP

We will be accepting applications until the position has been filled.

About Us

Kroenke Sports & Entertainment (KSE) is an American Sports and entertainment holding company based in Denver, Colorado. Kroenke Sports & Entertainment is committed to providing world class sports and entertainment for both live and broadcast audiences. We will welcome fans into our venues as family, providing respect and care from the purchase of a ticket, to the drive home. We will celebrate the best in sport and entertainment by recognizing the diversity and human spirit around us, and by working within our community to improve the lives of all those within the community. We will strive to perform this mission within a viable and self-sustaining business model.

About Our Job

This Junior Web Developer is responsible for maintaining and developing new features on the Outdoor Sportsman Group family of websites.

Job Responsibilities Will Include
Developing site features and functionality for our family of websites.
Performing site maintenance including bug fixes.
Evaluate scope and requirements based on project documentation.
Follow documented deployment procedures.
Develop user testing procedures.
Document internal processes.
About You

Our ideal candidate will have the following:
Knowledge, Skill and Ability: ASP.Net C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, SQL and general database knowledge, Version Control (Git)
Creating and consuming REST services a plus
Excellent interpersonal skills including strong verbal, listening, and written communication
Self-motivated with the ability to handle multiple ongoing projects in a fast-paced team environment
Ability to work independently on projects as well as collaborate with the team
Excellent attention to detail, flexible, and adaptable to changes
Ability to operate under pressure and meet or exceed deadlines
Qualifications

We appreciate your interest in working with KSE but please do not apply if you do not have the following required minimum qualifications
Education Requirement - Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in computer science or equivalent.
Experience Requirement - Two or more years of experience developing websites.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'POSITION SUMMARY:

Velocity Global is one of the fastest growing self-funded companies in the country and hands down one of the greatest places to work anywhere in the world. But it\xe2\x80\x99s not for everyone. There are certain qualities and passions you must have to fit into our \xe2\x80\x9cTeam of 10\xe2\x80\x99s\xe2\x80\x9d:
We move with VELOCITY and you have to relish in a fast-paced, high-growth environment
We believe in being of service, which means you have to check your ego at the door
We believe in taking our work seriously but not being serious at work
We find passion in all things international business \xe2\x80\x93 it has to be in your bones

If you find the above personal attributes apply to you, continue reading.

We are looking for a creative and talented Web Developer to be based in our Denver, CO headquarters. This full-time position will be responsible for a wide variety of web development and design duties to enhance our corporate website and assist in marketing efforts. The successful candidate is proficient at coding/customizing open source CMS systems and turning unique designs into dynamic websites, microsites and online campaigns. This role requires a high level of creativity, attention to detail, and project management skills. This individual will report to the Creative Services Manager and will work closely with the marketing team and all sides of the organization.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
Create custom-coded, engaging, web solutions using HTML5, CSS3/SASS, Javascript, and WordPress/PHP.
Develop, design, and continuously improve the corporate website, landing pages, microsites, etc. to support the overall marketing strategy and revenue goals
Work closely with creative team to transform visual concepts into interactive, multi-media experiences
Create custom-code solutions for Marketing Automation Platforms and CRMs (HubSpot/Marketo/Salesforce) including landing pages, emails, campaigns.
Create interactive diagrams, dynamic maps, and animations using HTML5.
Develop code using best practices for mobile and responsive design.
Set up and maintain Google Webmaster Tools, Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics, etc.
Implement best practices for marketing analytics, SEO, and GDPR compliance.
Make frequent enhancements and optimizations to web properties for optimal speed and security.
Document web development improvements and processes
Manage the host server, database, and ongoing maintenance.
Understand our different audiences and buyer personas to help guide targeted web content that addresses their unique needs and concerns.
Ensure that all projects are delivered in a timely manner.
Support brand consistency across all digital channels.
Work closely with Digital Experience team to continually A/B test elements within our digital properties to optimize the user experience and drive conversions
The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not construed to be an exhaustive list of all job duties performed by the personnel so classified.

QUALIFICATIONS:
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.

Education/Experience:
3-5 years of experience in enterprise website development using WordPress.
Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree or experience equivalent
Proficient in HTML5, CSS3/SASS, Javascript, and WordPress/PHP.
Adept at mobile and responsive design, testing, and troubleshooting.
Seasoned with WordPress creation of custom post types, Bootstrap framework, standard plugin understanding (Visual Composer, Gravity Forms, Advanced Custom Fields, Yoast)
Server management: Domain control panels, DNS, website testing and launch
Proficient with Adobe Creative Suite, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Microsoft Office and other analytics tools
Experience optimizing digital channels for SEO, mobile, cross-platform and cross-browser issues
Must have exceptional attention to detail and project management skills
Ability to own a project from start to finish, working autonomously, but welcoming feedback and collaboration
Passionate about branding, storytelling, and producing engaging content and campaigns.
Strong communicator with the ability to prioritize and manage work effectively while adhering to critical timelines
UI design experience a plus
WordPress and HubSpot/Marketo experience required

Velocity Global is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, age, disability, genetic information, or any other status protected by State and/or Federal Law.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Web Developer \xe2\x80\x93 Boulder, CO

Matter Communications is an independent and thriving integrated marketing firm focused on what matters most: our people, our clients and our results. From fast growth startups to established brands, we work with B2B and B2C companies at all stages of development and across all industries.

We\xe2\x80\x99ve built and nurtured a team-oriented, supportive environment because we know that when we tap into our collective brainpower we come up with inspired solutions for our clients and because it makes for a happy place to work.  While we\xe2\x80\x99re serious about what we do, we try not to take ourselves too seriously. 

Matter is looking for an experienced Front-End Developer to join and grow our web development team. This position will lead and build digital web solutions for clients.  This person will play a key role as part of the digital marketing team and will help ensure our clients can deliver best in class digital experiences.  The ideal candidate is willing to roll up their sleeves in our fast-paced environment, will be an expert on all things development, and is able to thrive in client facing interactions.  

Responsibilities:

Day-to-day responsibilities include the development of web-based applications and websites
Integration of code with other technologies (web services, client backend systems, content management systems, etc.)
Optimizing performance of frontend applications
Collaborate with clients and internal teams to assist with briefs, gathering requirements and functional specifications
Engage in brainstorming and collaborate with other developers on the team to solve problems and craft innovative, bespoke web solutions for our clients
Be an internal expert on all things web development, mentor and share knowledge with staff
Continually explore and evaluate new technologies, frameworks, and methodologies that Matter can leverage to improve both our own internal web development processes and the overall service we provide to our clients
Collaborating with clients, digital marketing team, and creative group to develop web solutions for our clients
Assist with updating and maintaining our portfolio of client sites, as well as Matter\xe2\x80\x99s own website
Develop, coordinate, and evolve quality assurance (testing) procedures to ensure error-free work product
Technical Requirements:

Portfolio of web work in the B2B and B2C space
At least 2-4 years\xe2\x80\x99 experience in a digital agency or web development environment
At least 3-5 years of WordPress & PHP development experience
Wordpress Custom Theme Development & ACF Experience
JavaScript & jQuery experience
MySQL experience
HubSpot COS experience
Experience creating responsive, mobile friendly websites
Experience working with graphic designers and converting designs to code
Experience implementing analytics code and setting up analytic event tracking using various platforms (Google Analytics, HubSpot, Google Tag Manager, Marketo, etc.)
Ecommerce development experience
MarTech integration experience
Non-Technical Requirements:

College graduate with B.A./B.S. degree
Autonomous and driven to own deliverables from beginning to end with little direct supervision
Demonstrated ability to project manage, set priorities, and solve problems
Demonstrated experience supervising, mentoring, and leading other developers
Ability to collaborate as part of integrated teams of non-technical colleagues.
Ability to collaborate and participate in new business development efforts
Matter provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws'

title: b'Javascript Developer'
job description:
b'Company
Anark is a leading provider of intelligent information management (IIM) software and solutions for technical industry, enabling engineering, procurement, manufacturing, and field service organizations to publish and manage technical content, for access and collaboration workflows across the extended enterprise\xe2\x80\x94yielding faster iterations, reduced material waste, and higher-quality products and services with substantial cost savings.
Anark helps market leaders such as GE, Boeing, Lockheed Martin, Allison Transmission, Johnson & Johnson, Cisco, Ericsson, and TE Connectivity with their Digital Transformation, leveraging smart technical content to streamline procurement, manufacturing, and field service operations.

Culture
Come work in a cutting-edge, exciting, fun, energetic, friendly, and supportive work environment. Anark Corporation strives to be a \xe2\x80\x9cchange the world\xe2\x80\x9d innovator.

Opportunity
As a JavaScript Developer at Anark (Solutions Engineer II internally) you will be in a 3 part hybrid role; JavaScript Software Developer, a customer-facing Solutions Engineer, and also work as a Software QA (UI Test) engineer across the whole enterprise system. This is a very exciting and multi-faceted role. In addition to providing direct customer support including customer solution deliverables, this position is also responsible for the development of internal QA test strategies, data test cases, and tools necessary to guarantee the quality of Anark software.

The ideal candidate will be proficient in JavaScript and have completed a 4 year degree from an accredited University with a Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, or Electrical Engineering degree. 

Required Knowledge and Skills
Experience with web application development using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Bootstrap.
IT experience configuring software systems, including databases.
Experience with the principles of manufacturing engineering or technical industries.
Strong technical and communication skills\xe2\x80\x94capable of garnering the respect of team members and associates within the company.
Strong work ethic\xe2\x80\x94able to manage multiple customer deliverables while adhering to customer-negotiated schedules.

Desired Skills
JavaScript web-based automated test framework.
Experience with Windows and Linux server systems.
AWS, Azure, or Oracle Cloud computing services experience.
MCAD or ECAD experience.

Required Education and Professional Experience
BS in Computer Science, Aerospace Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent preferred
BSCS new graduates accepted
Bootcamp + 1 year of corporate developer experience considered

Compensation
Anark offers a competitive salary, performance bonus plan, stock options, 401(k) retirement program with employer match, and a comprehensive and generous benefits program.

Citizenship
This position requires either US citizenship or US permanent resident legal status. A background check will be performed on all qualified applicants prior to an offer for employment.'

Use an agile-based, hybrid, project management approach that focuses on the understanding, capture, and documentation of business processes and associated requirements prior-to and during application development activities.

Real world experience, not project Bootcamp experience

Required
NodeJS 10.x, Express REST server, ES6 Coding Style, Typescript, Angular 1.x

Understands OAuth, Semantic Web or RDF, Elastic Search Query Syntax, WordPress Experience, AWS understanding of EC2, S3Git Experience, Experience in Leaflet, Geospatial Formats"
